description: This arch is likely the only double-barrel design of its kind, showcasing the creativity and resourcefulness of the students who built it. The Hay Bale Arch utilizes straw for its surprisingly effective insulation properties.
extended_description: The unique 'window of truth' offers a glimpse into the straw core, educating visitors about alternative building materials. Its double-barrel design is likely one-of-a-kind, showcasing the creative potential of combining traditional materials with modern architectural concepts. The structure serves as both an educational exhibit and a testament to sustainable building practices.

images.description: Main image of the Hay Bale Arch.
Close-up image of the Hay Bale Arch.
